title: NS Define AL 170 is a longer travel, mixed-wheel MTB for when enduro isnâ€™t enough
content:
We got a sneak peek at NS Bikes’ reworking of their popular all-mountain trail-to-enduro bike last summer, but the new Define AL 170 takes it to the next level with an even longer-travel version. Because sometimes not even enduro is enough. Now pairing a 27.5″ rear wheel & 170mm frame travel to a long 180mm […]

The post NS Define AL 170 is a longer travel, mixed-wheel MTB for when enduro isn’t enough appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
